nodes.bodyText: Can we keep this here - I fear this will come back to haunt us
If it please you, I can
Yeah, we have just fought such a long battle against crashes, I like catching exceptions just...in...case - Android platform is endlessly surprising in the ways it can crash

A "catch all" exception is a "we don't know what'll happen here".
I don't particularly like it, but it's much worse if it throws, as it's a "really important" path of the application.
Rebased to keep an error message. I just use "fmod", as "funcName" make little sens and give no more information here
